troparion: (Tone 8) Grant us help with our sadness* and save us, O Lord, Lover of mankind* born of the Virgin.
prokimenon: Let Your mercy, O Lord, be upon us,
as we have hoped in You.
Rejoice in the Lord, O you just; praise befits the righteous.
second_prokimenon: Clap your hands, all you nations; shout unto God with the voice of joy.
